data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = x^2 \) and \( v = \sin(x) \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = e^x \) and \( v = x^2 \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = x^3 \) and \( v = \ln(x) \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = \cos(x) \) and \( v = x \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = x^2 - 2 \) and \( v = x^2 + 3x + 2 \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = x^3 + 2x \) and \( v = \sqrt{x} \).

data.body: Find the derivative of the function

data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = \tan(x) \) and \( v = x^2 \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = 2x^2 - x \) and \( v = e^x \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = x^3 - 1 \) and \( v = x^2 + 1 \).

data.title: Quotient Rule
data.body: Find the derivative of the function
data.prompt: Use the Quotient Rule to find the derivative of
data.explanation: Using the quotient rule: \( \left( \frac{u}{v} \right)' = \frac{u'v - uv'}{v^2} \), where \( u = e^x + 1 \) and \( v = x - 2 \).
